ValidationRule.description: Ensures an Opportunity Driver (Owner) is assigned before progressing opportunity from "Identify" to "Qualify" stage and beyond.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( StageName ), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Qualify"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Propose"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ), Owner.IsActive = false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Update the Opportunity Driver. The current Opportunity Driver is not an active team member.
